original_title: The Minute You Wake Up Dead
overview: A stockbroker in a small southern town gets embroiled in an insurance scam with a next-door neighbor that leads to multiple murders when a host of other people want in on the plot. Sheriff Thurmond Fowler, the by-the-book town sheriff for over four decades, works earnestly to try and unravel the townâ€™s mystery and winds up getting more than he bargained for.
title: The Minute You Wake Up Dead
